org.flixel.data
Class FlxQuake

java.lang.Object
  org.flixel.data.FlxQuake

public class FlxQuake
extends java.lang.Object

This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'quake' or screenshake effect.

Field Summary
 int x
          The amount of X distortion to apply to the screen.
 int y
          The amount of Y distortion to apply to the screen.

          Constructor.

Method Detail

start

public void start(float Intensity,
                  float Duration)
Reset and trigger this special effect.

Parameters:
Intensity - Percentage of screen size representing the maximum distance that the screen can move during the 'quake'.
Duration - The length in seconds that the "quake" should last.
